Dingbats

Here are som graphics buttons and icons to use in the manuals. If you want to use other such "dingbats" in your manual, plase add them to doc/images and to this page. That way we can assure a more consistent look of our manuals.

Notifications

Use the large or small version whichever looks best in your context.

Warning: A small warning.
